ShobhaShringar

With a legacy of rich 40 years, ShobhaShringar Jewellers captures the essence of a woman’s multifaceted nature through its designer & luxury and customized bridal jewellery.

Heritage

Since many years now, A wide variety of Gold collection, Diamond collection and Polki collection, Shobha Shringar has come a long way in keeping their customers updated with the heritage which inspires the future.

Shobha Shringar Jewellers manufacture the most fine and customized jewellery designers based in Mumbai. With their exclusive and fine collection of Gold, Diamond and Polki jewellery there is no doubt in saying that they are the best jewellery designers in town.

SSJ has also appeared in many media and events too. Looking forward to bridal? they got you covered with their Bridal D’Amor collection which will leave you amazed. Do not forget to checkout their Miss India and Celebrity collection too. Amazed and wish to see our collection in real? Walk into our flagship boutique in Mumbai and experience the jewellery shopping experience like never before.

Instagram Handle

About ShobhaShringar

Shobha Shringar Jewellers aims to present art made in gold adorned by precious stones and pearls. Each piece is a testimony to its love for traditional crafts, and drive to create unique jewellery. Its forte is to identify the new trends and blend them with antique designs to satisfy and appreciate the modern woman’s desire to have distinctive pieces rooted in tradition and culture.

Designs offered

All the items offered by Shobha Shringar Jewellers have BIS hallmark. Its jewellery is synonymous with purity, craftsmanship and creativity. It has a young team which absorbs the latest trends, which makes it relevant and popular in the ever changing world of jewellery fashion.

Its main collections are in gold and also feature unique combinations in different stones and pearls like turquoise, coral, baroque and Basra and also uncut diamonds. Shobha Shringar Jewellers also offers customised creations to match your vision and personality. Offering various styles from Jadau, to Polki to bridal, and also designer and fusion, you can select anything your heart desire.
